flawed_nl_solution:
The profit Ronald wants is $3000 / 3 = $<<3000/3=10000.0>>10000.0
The profit per phone sold will be $10000.0 / 200 phones = $<<10000.0/200=50.0>>50.0/phone
The cost of each phone is $3000 / 200 phones = $<<3000/200=15.0>>15.0/phone
The selling price including the profit will be $15.0/phone + $50.0/phone = $<<15.0+50.0=65.0>>65.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1000.0, not 10000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
